name: Hat Trick (Drezus)
description:
The evil Medusa turned the clumsy witchcraft apprentice Jenny into a stone statue! But her magic powers lives on her mind... Use it to move your hat around and recover from this terrible curse!

Use the Spell Board to the right of the screen to drawn shapes and cast spells. "Draw" shapes by holding down the mouse button and hovering over the Spell Board's dots. Release the mouse to confirm a spell shape. If you cast the spell correctly, the hat will react accordingly.

Press ESC at any time to quit the game.
